DOC.brief_summary: The prevalence obesity steadily increase United States . This lead worsening type 2 diabetes mellitus , hypertension , sleep apnea , coronary artery disease osteoarthritis . The medical management obesity involve dietary counseling education , behavioral counseling goal setting , exercise . Patients short sleep period range 5 7 hour per night often heavier normal sleeper even control factor .
